info.title: Book page image API
info.description:
API for fetching a book page image, which you can then manipulate (see the OpenLibrary Book API reference on the Community resources page), for example, crop or rotate

This API causes a redirect. Make sure that your request mechanisms are configured to follow redirects as the above call will trigger a url redirect from the canonical /download path to the server on which the actual book page resides on disk.

Therefore, when you use this sandbox to enter the parameters and press 'Execute', you'll get a CORS error. But, you can copy the generated Request URL to a browser, and see the result.

get.description: The identifier for the Archive.org item for which you want the image.

parameters.name: itemid
parameters.description: Try with `theworksofplato01platiala` as the ID. Or, see how to find the unique identifier of an item.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The specific page that has an image you want to retrieve.
